name: Silent Night (itch) (Crobycheese)
description:
(Demo only out at this time)

A brand new horror game where you and your lantern are trapped in the dark.

- There are 2 game modes, Normal and classic (Classic is from the demo)

- Remember the monster hides from you, out of you lit path

- This has jump scares so just be warned

- The monster is deaf and blind and runs a loop so use that to survive

Normal mode (Hard):

Your goal, last as long as possible, earn achievements over time. It also has jumpscares.

Classic mode (Easy):

A timer of 43 seconds runs down while you try to collect as many coins a possible, while a monster chases you and sends you to the start(to make it hard to get points)  if you get cached.

Look out for Silent 2 (A prequel- IT'S IN THE FOREST)
